title: Kennesaw Mountain National Battlefield Park: Curriculum Materials
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Curriculum Materials                Curriculum Materials       The Parks As Classrooms program brings the history and great outdoors of Kennesaw Mountain National Battlefield Park to you, allowing students to learn about the people and events of this site from the classroom. Battlefield staff has developed lessons that will connect students and teachers to the historic events that took place here in a tangible way. Lessons for social studies and science are also available for download.
